title: 水面反射MOD
author: nosoma
txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: well
replies.txt_content:
nosoma 发表于 2011-10-23 16:50 
我搓！OptiFine……我装了，怎么卸载啊？
呃... 找個乾淨的 minecraft.jar 重新安裝... 

如果要卸載的話, 看OptFine安裝時, 放入了哪些 .class文件, 把它們從 minecraft.jar 中刪除, 兩個英文字命名的 .class文件, 則另外從乾淨原版的 minecraft.jar 中複製過來取代...

replies.author: rickky2
replies.txt_content:
给错误来看看
不过我好像是更好草地跟水面mod有冲突

replies.author: nosoma
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: well
replies.txt_content:
看原帖說明, 有些MOD與它不相容... 
Known incompatibilities for the default version:
- Modloader (there is a modloader version; to install: start from a project using modloader; then copy the water shader files)
- OptiFine
- Forge API
- Better Than Wolves
- Finite Liquids

跟"比狼好"也有衝突啊...
